description: This Java class (TicketUploadController) is a REST controller in a Spring Boot application that handles the upload of Excel files containing ticket data. It exposes an endpoint at /api/tickets/upload for clients to upload an Excel file, processes the file via TicketMetricsService, and returns computed ticket metrics encapsulated in TicketMetricsResponse.
external_methods: TicketMetricsResponse constructor or static method (not shown)

classes.name: TicketUploadController
classes.description: REST controller handling ticket Excel file uploads and returning computed metrics
annotations: Tag(name = "Tickets", description = "Endpoints for uploading ticket Excel files and retrieving metrics")

fields.name: ticketMetricsService
fields.description: Service dependency used to compute metrics from uploaded files

methods.name: upload
methods.description: Handles POST requests to upload an Excel file and returns computed ticket metrics
annotations: Operation(summary = "Upload Excel and compute ticket metrics")

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Excel (.xlsx) file uploaded via multipart/form-data under 'file' field

methods.logic: Calls ticketMetricsService.computeMetrics(file) and returns the response wrapped in ResponseEntity.ok()

methods.name: upload
methods.description: Handles file upload, processes the Excel file, and returns ticket metrics
